mapper.select: SELECT roomNumber FROM roomTable WHERE roomNumber like CONCAT('%',#{cityCode},'%') AND maxGuest >= #{maxGuest}
SELECT count(*) FROM bookTable WHERE roomNumber = #{roomNumber}

select count(*) from (select #{ck_in} ck_in, #{ck_out} ck_out) i where exists ( select 1 from bookTable where bookTable.roomNumber = #{roomNumber} AND bookTable.pay_st != 'C' AND bookTable.ck_in < i.ck_out AND bookTable.ck_out > i.ck_in )

SELECT r.roomNumber, r.roomName, avg(v.stars_avg)as starAvg, count(v.title) as cnt, h.hotelNumber, h.addr1, r.baseCost, r.weekCost, r.longCost from roomTable r left outer join review v on r.roomNumber = v.roomNumber left outer join hotelTable h on r.hotelNumber = h.hotelNumber where r.roomNumber = #{roomNumber}
